title: 93/435/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 July 1993 amending Council Decision 79/542/EEC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of bovine animals, swine, equidae, sheep and goats, fresh meat and meat products
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 July 1993 amending Council Decision 79/542/EEC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of bovine animals, swine, equidae, sheep and goats, fresh meat and meat products
(93/435/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex of Decision 79/542/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 146, 14. 6. 1979, p. 15.
(4) OJ No L 138, 9. 6. 1993, p. 11.
ANNEX
This list is a list in principle and importations shall fulfil the relevant animal and public health requirements
PART 1   LIVE ANIMALS, FRESH MEAT AND MEAT PRODUCTS
/* Tables: see OJ */
PART 2   SPECIAL COLUMN FOR EQUIDAE
/* Tables: see OJ */
(1) Member States shall only import equidae in accordance with Commission Decision 92/160/EEC establishing the regionalization.
